description: The Best BOTANICAL HYALURONIC ACID (5.0%) Gel FOR SUPER SKIN HYDRATION!!!The Cuticle Layer of the Skin Normally Contains 10-20% Water - However As We Age It Can Drop Below 10%!Is YOUR Skin DYING From Lack Of MOISTURE?-Literally!...Is Lack Of Proper Moisture Levels Causing Premature Signs Of Aging & Wrinkles!• Our Botanical Hyaluronic Acid Comes To Your Rescue With Its Unique Ability To Hold More Than 1,000 Times Its Weight In Water!• This Botanical Hyaluronic Acid Will Assist Your Skin In Absorbing Moisture From Whatever Moisturizing Agent You Apply Next & From The Environment & Air Itself!• Hyaluronic Acid Is Directly Correlated to Increases in Skin Moisture!• This Natural Extract Also Functions As An Anti-Inflammatory & Treatment For Acne.*• Can Be Used On Face, Neck & Body!Derived From Plant Sources (Not From Rooster Combs or Other Animal Parts!)√ Hyaluronic Acid is derived from either ROOSTER COMBS/Animal Parts OR From Plant Extracts -√ We Only Use the 100% Vegan Variety - Plant Derived Material (Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide)- A Botanical Ingredient Retrieved From the Cassia Angustifolia, a Plant Native To India.√ In cosmetics it is primarily used as a skin moisturizing agent due to its high content of polysaccharides.√ These polysaccharides mimic hyaluronic acid, a component of the skin which assists tissue repair and protection.√ When applied topically this plant based hyaluronic acid penetrates the dermis to secure moisture and in turn supports the skins elasticity and structure.You Will Love This Product!You Have No Risk With Our 30 Day "Customer Happiness" Satisfaction Guarantee!"Press "Add To Cart Now" And Save Your Skin Before It's too Late!*These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
